hero.title: Your Trusted Partner in Building a Secure and Smart Digital Future Aligned with Saudi Vision 2030
hero.welcome: Eazy Cyber Agent is a Saudi company specializing in cybersecurity and digital solutions. We provide integrated services in artificial intelligence, big data, and cloud computing. Our mission is to support both public and private sectors in driving digital transformation and achieving Vision 2030 goals toward a knowledge-based, innovative economy.

about.hero_content: Eazy Cyber Agent is a Saudi company specializing in cybersecurity and digital solutions. We provide integrated services in artificial intelligence, big data, and cloud computing. Our mission is to support both public and private sectors in driving digital transformation and achieving Vision 2030 goals toward a knowledge-based, innovative economy.
about.team_content: Our team combines deep technical expertise with a commitment to excellence. It includes certified professionals in cybersecurity, AI, and data analytics, all working together to realize the company's vision.
about.cta_heading: Join us in building a secure and intelligent digital future.
about.vision_content: To be the first choice in Saudi Arabia and the region for delivering innovative digital and security solutions that empower organizations to adapt and achieve digital sustainability.
about.mission_content: To empower organizations to build secure and intelligent infrastructures using the latest technologies in AI, big data, and cybersecurityâ€”aligned with the Kingdom's Vision 2030 digital transformation strategy.

whyChooseUs.hero_content: We are not just a service provider; we are your strategic partner in securing your digital assets and achieving your business goals. Our commitment to excellence, local expertise, and international standards makes us the ideal choice for organizations across Saudi Arabia.
main_points: Certified professionals (CISSP, CEH, CISM, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor)
Full compliance with NCA-ECC, SAMA, and NDMO regulations
Tailored solutions designed for the Saudi market
whyChooseUs.strengths_content: Our team brings together decades of combined experience in cybersecurity, AI, and data analytics. We stay ahead of emerging threats and leverage cutting-edge technologies to protect your organization. As a Saudi company, we understand the unique regulatory and cultural context of doing business in the Kingdom, and we are proud contributors to Vision 2030's digital transformation objectives.
whyChooseUs.certifications_content: We hold and maintain industry-leading certifications and adhere to the highest international standards, including ISO 27001, NCA-ECC, and SAMA cybersecurity frameworks. Our team is certified by globally recognized bodies, ensuring you receive world-class expertise backed by proven methodologies.
whyChooseUs.commitment_content: Your success is our success. We work closely with you to understand your needs, design solutions that fit your environment, and provide ongoing support to ensure long-term security and resilience.
